verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] selected federal land in Texas as a place to temporarily house unaccompanied immigrant children , as the agency seeks more capacity amid the increasing number of families separated at the border because of the administration 's policies .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] has [V: selected] [ARG1: federal land in Texas] [ARG3: as a place to temporarily house unaccompanied immigrant children] , [ARGM-ADV: as the agency seeks more capacity amid the increasing number of families separated at the border because of the administration 's policies] .

The Trump administration has selected federal land in Texas as [ARGM-LOC: a place] to [ARGM-TMP: temporarily] [V: house] [ARG1: unaccompanied immigrant children] , as the agency seeks more capacity amid the increasing number of families separated at the border because of the administration 's policies .
